features: UNIQUE HANDMADE DESIGN: This ceramic handmade ashtray features a cool and cute poker ash tray design, making it a perfect decoration and a fantasy gift for smokers and poker lover.

VERSATILE & DURABLE: Crafted from high-quality ceramic, this ashtray for weed is strong and sturdy, ensuring long-lasting durability even with frequent use. These poker ashtrays also serve multiple purposes as it can also be used as a jewelry tray or key holder, making it a versatile addition to your home or office.

PERFECT FANTASY GIFT: Looking for a unique and fantasy-inspired gift for a smoking enthusiast? Look no further! This ashtray is not only a functional accessory but also a decorative piece that will bring joy to the recipient.
PRACTICAL & STYLISH: These ash trays function as a practical home accessory while adding a touch of elegance to any tabletop decor or interior design, making it an ideal decoration for your space.

SAFE SHIPPING & RELIABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE: We use gift box outside and polystyrene foam inside to pack your ashtray securely, minimizing the risk of breakage during transportation. If you receive any damaged product, please contact us and we will ensure that you receive prompt assistance and a resolution to your satisfaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Green Resin Ashtray & Home Decor Gift Wooden Cigar Ashtray Material Resin Wood Gift Box ✓ ✓

Introducing the ultimate addition to your smoking experience - the Poker Ash Tray! Crafted with exquisite attention to detail, this ceramic ashtray is a delightful blend of functionality and aesthetics. Whether you enjoy a good smoke indoors or outdoors, this ashtray is designed to enhance your smoking experience while adding a touch of whimsy to your space. Besides being a practical accessory, this ashtray also doubles as an alluring decoration piece. With its cool, cute, and funny appearance, it effortlessly captures attention and becomes an instant conversation starter. The intricate details and vivid colors create a visually appealing ornament that complements any setting, be it your home, patio, or garden. Spruce up your living space with this unique piece of home décor, adding a dash of charm to your surroundings. Looking for a remarkable gift for your smoker friends or family members? Look no further! The Poker Ash Tray is the perfect choice for both men and women, making it an ideal present for any occasion. Be it Christmas, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, or a special occasion, this fantasy gift is sure to impress and delight your loved ones. Upgrade your smoking experience and add a touch of elegance and functionality to your routine with the Poker Ash Tray. Immerse yourself in the joy of smoking while appreciating the artistic beauty of this handmade masterpiece. Don't settle for ordinary ashtrays when you can indulge in a truly remarkable piece of craftsmanship. Order now and transform your smoking moments into unforgettable experiences!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for my usage with moxa. I needed something for that and this is perfect. I can even use it with the guys for poker night if they need it for their cigars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son to use on the back porch when he smokes. It’s a bit bigger than I thought it was but I’m actually glad it is bigger! Really really cool item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ace of Spades...
reviews.reviewText: I'm a poker player so I like all things card related... This ashtray is handmade so it's not perfect and it's a little on the bulky side but overall pretty nice and looks cool on the coffee table. Would make a nice gift for the poker lover in your life...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Totalmente decorativo y práctico para los fumadores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome decor - even when you don’t smoke
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are a huge fan of Vegas and we collect playing cards. So when I saw this ashtray, even though we don’t smoke, and we don’t have any friends that smoke, I knew we had to have it just for decor on our coffee table. First of all this ashtray is pretty big. If you were to use it as an ashtray, it could hold a lot of ashes. It also has two cigarette holders which is just neat looking. We love how it looks and if you are a fan of Vegas or of playing cards or anything that reminds you do this decoration- you will definitely love this ashtray

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This ashtray reminds my wife of her childhood years.
reviews.reviewText: My wife got this ashtray because it reminded her of when she was a child and her parents's friends would come over to play cards. Those were happy times, and this ashtray reminds her of those days back in the 1950's and early 1960's. Back in those days those who were so inclined could get together to smoke, drink, and gamble without the political/nutritional know-it-alls trying to interfere with one's fun. Oh, sweet nostalgia!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic looking ash tray
reviews.reviewText: The red on this Ace of Hearts is beautiful and bright. The heart in the middle is raised which gives this piece and extra bit of interest. We're going to use it as a conversation piece on game night and to hold small tokens during play. It's too pretty to actually use for ashes but you can if you wish. Excellent novelty item.
